short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add life to your webpages with these colorful stickmen. More coming soon

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to add different colored and animated stickmen to your page. Some will move around while others are animated in place. You can drag and drop them wherever.
